descriptionHtml:
Hotfix for Undeath Invisible Scrye

Idea taken from Undeath forum section post:

notmyhome 3 kudos384 posts

User moirai seems to have found the solution to this, he posted a comment in the main comment section:

moirai
[...]
As a side note on the issue of missing Scryes; I found that extracting the scrye mesh from the Dragonborn BSA and putting it in the correct folder structure as a loose file solve the glitch. After doing so, all scryes were visible.

Go thank him if it solved the issue for you!

Installation:
Activate with NMM

Uninstallation
Deactivate with NMM
author: GaryII
